summary.Title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary.Presentation: Do you have a solid background in working with data and python? Are you skilled in translating business needs into IT solutions? Do you value working in a team where aspirations are high? Then you

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have a solid background in working with data and python? Are you skilled in translating business needs into IT solutions? Do you value working in a team where aspirations are high? Then you should read on!

About the job

DSB is on an exciting journey. We have set progressive goals about our efficiency and reliability centered around our customers and a deep respect for the environment. We consider AI as an important tool in reaching those goals.

We are looking for a machine learning engineer for our AI, ML & Advanced Analytics department who can assist our team in creating new AI solutions and improving existing ones.

Along with the team you will work on identifying, scoping and delivering AI solutions across DSB. We aim to have all team members participate in all phases of our projects.

You will be responsible for acquiring data and assisting our data scientists in understanding and gaining insights from it. We also expect that you will assist in the integration process of our solutions in collaboration with colleagues from other teams in IT.

About you

You are motivated and have a solid business understanding. You take responsibility for our shared goals and are motivated by change.

We expect that you

  • have good communication skills
  • are a team player
  • enjoy code in Python and have a good handle on best practices and software design
  • have experience with MLOps and delivering ML projects
  • are comfortable interacting with a wide variety of stakeholders
  • are motivated by learning and understanding new areas within DSB
  • like to question the status quo and learn about new technology

We work with the following tech-stack, so it is a bonus if you have some experience (but not required) in the following

  • Databricks and Spark
  • MLFlow
  • Azure cloud services, in particular Azure Data Lake, VMs, and WebApps
  • REST APIs
  • .Net

Who are we?

We are a new department in DSB, born from our Digital Innovation unit. Currently our team consist of 7 people with experience within data science, software development, innovation and product development. We have a solid focus on collaboration and aim to maintain an friendly culture in our team.

We set our goals high and seek to realize the potential that data and AI offers. By having close dialogs with our colleagues across the business we aim to inspire and move DSB close to its goals of delivering the best and most efficient service possible.

What DSB offers

As a new employee in DSB you don’t just get a new job, you become part of a community.

You place of employment will be Telegade 2 in Høje Taastrup, close to public transport.

We value our employees well-being and offer a canteen and fitness center at our office. Furthermore we have fitness offerings outside our offices, the option of an employee train pass, benefits when traveling with DSB along with your family and a health insurance including preventive treatment.

Salary and terms of employment

You will be employed based on current union agreements

Application

Application deadline is 15.05.2022. We conduct interviews continuously, so we urge you to apply now.

Please attach relevant documents like your written application, CV and diploma

We look forward to receiving your application.

Should you have any questions about the position, feel free to contact Steffen Pedersen at stepede@dsb.dk or by phone 24 68 81 32.
